thread.title: Birthday Treat
thread.title_full: Birthday Treat - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Barry D
title: Birthday Treat
text:
They made us feel very welcome, great location central for everything best part of town. I can not recommend this hotel enough the head guy on the desk during the morning is the best and so helpful. They made it there business to know when it was my wife's birthday and left prosecco in our room with two glass lovely surprise. I will let the photos do the talking but please give it a go quality fantastic, we will be going again. The view of the Pantheon was from our hotel room. One last note they have a roof top bar.
See all photos
